EmbeddedProjectSample.Name: Blink
EmbeddedProjectSample.Description: A very basic sample demonstrating how to control the LEDs via a GPIO port

PropertyEntry.Name: LED Port Group
PropertyEntry.Description: Specifies the delay (in milliseconds) between LED toggling events

PropertyEntry.Name: LED Port Number
PropertyEntry.Description: Specifies the port number of the LED port

PropertyEntry.Name: Delay (cycles)
PropertyEntry.Description: Specifies the delay (in milliseconds) between LED toggling events
